query.statement: SELECT MEMO_ID ,COMP_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,SENDER_ID ,SENDER_NAME ,SENDER_POS ,SENDER_DEPT_ID ,SENDER_DEPT_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,RECEIVER_ID ,RECEIVER_NAME ,RECEIVER_POS ,RECEIVER_DEPT_ID ,RECEIVER_DEPT_NAME ,READ_DATE ,DELETE_YN ,ATTACH_COUNT ,COUNT(*) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM TCN_MEMO WHERE 1=1 #if ($vo.receiverId) AND RECEIVER_ID = :vo.receiverId #end #if ($vo.senderId) AND SENDER_ID = :vo.senderId #end #if ($vo.searchValue) #if ($vo.searchType && $vo.searchType.equals("title")) AND TITLE LIKE '%' || :vo.searchValue || '%' #end #if ($vo.searchType && $vo.searchType.equals("senderName")) AND SENDER_NAME = :vo.searchValue #end #if ($vo.searchType && $vo.searchType.equals("receiverName")) AND RECEIVER_NAME = :vo.searchValue #end #end #if ($vo.isMain) AND READ_DATE IS NULL #end ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT MEMO_ID ,COMP_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,SENDER_ID ,SENDER_NAME ,SENDER_POS ,SENDER_DEPT_ID ,SENDER_DEPT_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,RECEIVER_ID ,RECEIVER_NAME ,RECEIVER_POS ,RECEIVER_DEPT_ID ,RECEIVER_DEPT_NAME ,READ_DATE ,DELETE_YN ,ATTACH_COUNT FROM TCN_MEMO WHERE MEMO_ID = :vo.memoId
UPDATE TCN_MEMO SET READ_DATE = sysdate WHERE MEMO_ID = :vo.memoId
DELETE FROM TCN_MEMO WHERE MEMO_ID IN ({{vo.ids}})
